Item/Function: LiDAR Point Cloud Processing — Object classification and tracking
Failure Mode: Ghost object generation (false positive object reported in driving path)
Local Effect: Object tracker reports non-existent obstacle at close range
System Effect: Forward Perception System issues unwarranted emergency brake request to Brake-by-Wire ECU
Vehicle Effect: Unexpected vehicle deceleration in highway traffic causing potential rear-end collision (violates SG-02)
Failure Cause: Sensor noise amplification due to EMI; reflection artifacts from highly reflective surfaces; software defect in clustering algorithm
Prevention/Detection: Multi-sensor fusion cross-validation with camera and radar; temporal consistency filter requiring 3 consecutive frames; plausibility check against HD map
Recommended Action: Implement independent point cloud integrity monitor with separate processing path; add sensor-level BIST for EMI susceptibility

Item/Function: Brake-by-Wire ECU — Brake force command signal transmission
Failure Mode: Loss of brake command signal (no output to brake actuator)
Local Effect: Brake actuator receives no updated pressure command; last-known-good value held by actuator watchdog
System Effect: Emergency Braking System unable to apply braking force when required by Forward Perception System
Vehicle Effect: Vehicle fails to decelerate for detected obstacle; potential frontal collision with preceding vehicle (violates SG-01)
Failure Cause: CAN bus wire harness open circuit; ECU processor lockup due to memory corruption; power supply brownout below operating threshold
Prevention/Detection: Alive counter and CRC on CAN messages; ECU hardware watchdog with 5 ms timeout; redundant communication path via secondary CAN channel; end-to-end E2E protection per AUTOSAR
Recommended Action: Add redundant brake command path via FlexRay backbone; implement independent brake actuator with hydraulic fallback
